price: دا هم يوازې داسې يو سړى دی چې پر الله يې درواغ تړلي او موږ يې منونكي نه يو.
arabic: إِنۡ هُوَ إِلَّا رَجُلٌ ٱفۡتَرَىٰ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ كَذِبٗا وَمَا نَحۡنُ لَهُۥ بِمُؤۡمِنِينَ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: in huwa illā rajulun if'tarā ʿalā al-lahi kadhiban wamā naḥnu lahu bimu'minīna
